metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000408 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A memory leak in glibc 2.1.1 (released on May 24, 1999) can be reached and amplified through the LD_HWCAP_MASK environment variable. Please note that many versions of glibc are not vulnerable to this issue if patched for CVE-2017-1000366.

criterions.comment: glibc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.27-3ubuntu1').
